item.slashblade.ex.tukumo.desc: Article of The Iron Wooden Sword
item.slashblade.ex.muramasa.desc: One of the lost muramasa swords.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul:
Limit of Refine=50
Blade is Fragile.
The soul never wastes.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_tiny:
Limit of Refine=10
Mysterious burning soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_ingot:
Limit of Refine=100
Steel forged with a burning soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_sphere:
Limit of Refine=150
Smelting
Jewel of Steel with a faint flame.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_crystal:
Limit of Refine=200
Blasting
The core of the blade soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_trapezohedron:
Unlimited Refinement
Smoking
The blade soul that arrives at the end.
adv.slashblade.reforge.desc: Blades and components are assembled using anvils.
adv.slashblade.refine.desc: Blades increase their potential each time they are refined.
adv.slashblade.bladestand.desc: A place to rest your blades.

adv.slashblade.enemy_step.desc:
In mid-air, use an enemy as a stepping stone to execute a double jump
Use buttons
Jump □:%s
In mid-air press □ near an enemy
adv.slashblade.kick_jump.desc:
In mid-air, use an wallblock as a stepping stone to execute a double jump
Use buttons
Jump □:%s
In mid-air press □ near an wallblock
adv.slashblade.guard.desc:
Blocks enemy ranged attacks and neutralizes damage. This technique expends the durability each time it is activated. Cannot be blocked while WALKING.
Use buttons
Sneak ⚪:%s
While on the ground, press ⚪
adv.slashblade.guard_just.desc:
Block and defend enemy attacks as close as possible, and do not consume durability at high ranks. Fills the Rank gauge.
Use buttons
Sneak ⚪:%s
Just as an enemy attacks, press ⚪
adv.slashblade.summonedswords.desc:
Launch swords.This technique expends the 1exp each time it is activated.
Use buttons
%s ♠:%s
press ♠
adv.slashblade.spiral_swords.desc:
Creates a ring of Summoned Swords around you that acts as a shield.This technique expends the 5exp each time it is activated.
Use buttons
%s ♠:%s
hold ♠
adv.slashblade.storm_swords.desc:
Countless swords surround an enemy, then attack all at once, launching them into the air.This technique expends the 5exp each time it is activated.
Use buttons
%s ♠:%s
Back ᐁ:%s
Sneak ⚪:%s
press ⚪+ᐁ hold ♠
adv.slashblade.blistering_swords.desc:
Create swords around you that launch themselves at your enemy one after another.This technique expends the 5exp each time it is activated.
Use buttons
%s ♠:%s
Forwerd ᐃ:%s
Sneak ⚪:%s
press ⚪+ᐃ hold and release ♠
adv.slashblade.heavy_rain_swords.desc:
Creates a rainfall of Swords above your enemy's head.This technique expends the 5exp each time it is activated.
Use buttons
%s ♠:%s
Back ᐁ:%s
Forwerd ᐃ:%s
Sneak ⚪:%s
press ⚪+ᐁ to ᐃ hold ♠
adv.slashblade.exeffect.soul_speed.desc: The input time limit for just actions will be extended by 1 tick for each soul speed level.
Falling speed during aerial actions will be reduced depending on Feather Falling level.
